Fist we load some packages. 

```{r}
library(cluster)
library(NbClust)
library(clustrd)
library(ggplot2)
library(pvclust)
library(reshape2)
library("ggthemes")
library(flexclust)
library(fpc)
```

Then we set a seed number. 

```{r}
set.seed(5154)
```
